name: U.S. Meat Animal Research Center
local: Outside university (USDA federal facility, Clay Center, Nebraska)
priority_areas: Sustainability in animal production, precision genetics, food safety.
target_audience: Meat industry, government, universities.

name: China Meat Research Center
local: Outside university (national specialized institution)
priority_areas: Meat processing, new product development, processing techniques, food safety, sustainability.
target_audience: Meat industry, government, universities, private companies.

name: National Research Centre on Meat
local: Outside university (autonomous ICAR center, Chengicherla, Hyderabad)
priority_areas: Agricultural Sciences, Life Sciences, Biotechnology.
target_audience: Meat processors, food industry, small ruminant, pig, and poultry producers.

name: Orr Beef Research Center
local: Within University of Illinois (Baylis, IL)
priority_areas: Beef cattle nutrition, reproductive management, grazing systems, extension.
target_audience: Local producers, students, academic community.

name: China Meat Food Comprehensive Research Center
local: Outside university, headquarters in Beijing, multiple facilities
priority_areas: Meat processing, food engineering, quality inspection, additive development, professional training, technology transfer.
target_audience: Meat industry, government, technical managers, science/technology institutions.

name: Ontario Beef Research Centre
local: Elora, ON – University of Guelph, Agri-Food Innovation Alliance partnership
priority_areas: Animal health, nutrition, genetics, management, welfare, sustainability, technology, reproduction.
target_audience: Producers, universities, researchers, government, food innovation sector.

name: Beef Carcass Research Center
local: West Texas A&M University campus, linked to Caviness Meat Science & Innovation Center
priority_areas: Carcass evaluation, post-slaughter data correlation, meat quality, standardization, technical services.
target_audience: Meat companies, packers, universities, associations (e.g., NCBA, USDA).

name: Meat Science and Innovation Center Honoring Ron Richard
local: University of Idaho campus, Moscow, ID
priority_areas: Meat science, processing, packaging, safety, agri-food extension, educational retail.
target_audience: Students, meat industry, local consumers, university extension, regional community.

name: Division of Meat Animal and Poultry Research
local: National Institute of Livestock and Grassland Science – NARO, Japan

target_audience: Japanese livestock sector, genetic/nutrition researchers, government, food industry.

name: Danish Meat Research Institute
local: Headquarters in Taastrup, Denmark, part of Danish Technological Institute, outside university
priority_areas: Meat processing, food safety, industrial automation, animal welfare at slaughter, digital/environmental solutions.
target_audience: Animal protein industries (beef, pork), governments, packers, cooperatives, tech firms.

name: Meat Industry Centre
local: On the campus of Agricultural Research Council – Animal Production Institute, South Africa
priority_areas: Meat science, food safety, processing, microbiology, physiology, biochemistry, probiotics, animal welfare
target_audience: Farmers, local slaughterhouses, technical institutions, labs, academic community, smallholders

name: Meat Industry Research Institute of New Zealand
governance: Mixed – autonomous industrial cooperative, later integrated into public research
local: Ruakura Campus, Hamilton – initially autonomous, now part of AgResearch
priority_areas: Meat science and technology; industrial processing; lamb, beef, pork export; packaging and quality control
target_audience: Meat export industry (freezing works, bacon curers), meat cooperatives, government, private firms, exporters

name: Beef Research Institute
governance: Public – under Kenya Agricultural and Livestock Research Organization (KALRO), Kenyan government
local: Headquarters in Lanet (Nakuru County), with centers in Garissa, Mariakani, Trans Mara – within KALRO

name: Abattoir & Meat Research

local: Dummerstorf, Germany – part of FBN (Forschungsinstitut für Nutztierbiologie) national livestock research institute

name: Grange Animal & Grassland Research Centre

name: Meat Science Research

name: Beef Cattle Research Center
